description: This file sets up a playground application for agents, importing various agent modules and configuring the app with specific agents and settings.

classes.name: Playground
classes.description: A class used to create and configure the agent playground application.

methods.name: get_app
methods.description: Method to retrieve the configured application instance from the Playground class.

methods.name: serve
methods.description: Method to run the playground server, with options for reloading.
